directions: In a medium bowl, mix together mayonnaise, sour cream, Italian-style salad dressing mix, curry powder, dried minced onion flakes, dried parsley, lemon juice, salt and Worcestershire sauce. Chill in the refrigerator until serving.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
title: Grandpa Gunn's Raw Veggie Dip
